rules_text:
Whenever you cast a spell that doesn't share a card type with another spell you've cast this turn, you get an experience counter.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay any number of experience counters. If you do, create twice that many 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens with haste.
notes:
